modules.name: Transposing Oscillator
modules.description: manipulate AR duration to organically transpose melodies

modules.name: Nonlinear Melody Transformer
modules.description: applies various transformations to an input based on minimum and maximum note

modules.name: Scanning Clock Multiplier
modules.description: Activated clock ratios get added to scannable list of outputs

modules.name: scanning clock multiplier v2
modules.description: create a scannable list of clock ratios

modules.name: scanning frequency division oscillator
modules.description: obtain organic transpositions and multiple harmonically related frequencies from a single v/oct

modules.name: phase-driven multihit envelope
modules.description: derive up to sixteen hits from a 0-10 sawtooth or steady clock pulse

modules.name: polyphonic scanning frequency division oscillator
modules.description: obtain organic transpositions and multiple harmonically related frequencies from a single v/oct

modules.name: Melody Transformer
modules.description: shape messy inputs into melodic outputs with selectable note priority
